com.CMPUT301W15T02.teamtoapp

Class LocalDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301W15T02.teamtoapp.LocalDataManager

  • public class LocalDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls link between local storage and elastic search server. LocalDataManager checks whether there is connectivity before manipulating data via server/local storage.
